title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: User cannot access the account; password reset succeeds but login still fails.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Checkout declines Visa ending 1234; bank confirms funds available.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: January invoice download button triggers no file; page briefly reloads.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: Android app closes immediately after splash screen on Android 13.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: 2FA SMS codes not received; email codes also fail intermittently.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal
description: Auto-renew toggle disabled in billing; customer wants to enable it.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Multiple cards rejected at gateway step; error code DO_NOT_HONOR.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: Updated address not persisting; invoice still shows previous city.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Refund requested two weeks ago; payment not returned to card.

title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
description: Avatar upload fails with generic error after selecting a JPG.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: Order placed successfully but no confirmation email received.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Invoice PDF returns 404 from billing page; retry still fails.
